backend

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.events.Event

  • public class Event
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a event that has tickets for sale in the system.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int numTickets
      an integer representing the number of tickets for sale
      private double price
      a double that represents the price of one ticket
      private java.lang.String seller
      a string that represents the name of seller
      private java.lang.String title
      a string that represents the title of the event

      • sellTickets

        public int sellTickets(int numTickets)
        This method is responsible for removing tickets from the number of tickets for sale. If the number of tickets to be removed exceeds the number of tickets for sale, an error is reported and method exits with status 2.
        Parameters:
        numTickets - an integer representing the number of tickets purchased.
        Returns:
        0 on success, 1 on failure, 2 on AmountExceedsSellMax, 3 on AmountExceedsNumTickets
